short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide comments made by users in the block list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add bot accounts and users who have made abusive or spam comments to a blocked list.

1. Right click on the user name or avatar in the comments section.
2. Select the "Block user" or "Unblock user" menu item.
